info.title: Intermezzo Global Payroll
info.description: Intermezzo's global payroll apis, organized by country

get.description: List employees for an organization with pagination and filtering support.

post.description: Create new job details for an employee.

get.description: Get current job details for an employee.

get.description: Get all historical versions of job details for an employee.

get.description: Get all historical versions of tax details for an employee.

post.description: Create new insurance details for an employee.

get.description: Get current insurance details for an employee.

put.description: Update insurance details for an employee (creates new version).

get.description: Get all historical versions of insurance details for an employee.
